message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I appreciate your offer, $120 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
